english.segment1: (Verse 1). This is a love. Deep in the soul. O when you love. O when you love. The veil is torn. Mystery pours
english.segment2: Down from above. Down from above
english.segment3: (Pre-Chorus). And yet we are under benediction. So there is grace
english.segment4: (Chorus). Hallelujah, we rejoice. What a Savior. What a King. Hallelujah, lift your voice. To our Savior. To our King
english.segment5: (Verse 2). O please do stay. Where you remain. Do not fall. Do not fall. Something greater. Is on the way. Just hang on. Try to hang on. Try to hang on
english.segment6: (Bridge). The love of angels. Becomes a love anew. O heavenly light. Takes on a fair skin
english.segment7: (Ending). What a Savior. What a King. (X12)
